bodyTemplate:
{{eventShortName}} {{eventEdition}} Waiting-List Registration

Hello {{firstName}},

Thank you for entering the waiting-list for {{eventName}} {{eventEdition}}! Here are your registration details:

  • Registration #: {{registrationNumber}}
  • Name: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
  • Email: {{email}}
  • Date of Birth: {{dateOfBirth}}
  • Nationality: {{nationality}}
  • Phone: {{phoneCountryCode}} {{phoneNumber}}
  • Race Distance: {{raceDistance}}
    • {{#if representing}}
  • Representing: {{representing}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if travelRequired}}
  • Travel Required: {{travelRequired}}
    • {{/if}} {{#if comments}}
  • Comments: {{comments}}
    • {{/if}}

The status for your registration is currently {{status}}. Once we register your payment, your registration will be confirmed and you will be in contention for free spots that become available.

Payment Information

Total Amount Due: {{paymentRequired}} NOK

Payment Methods:

  • Vipps/MobilePay: (+47) 913 51 909
  • Bank Transfer: KrUltra, account number 9802 46 25850
  • International Payments
    IBAN: NO61 9802 4625850
    BIC/SWIFT: DNBANOKKXXX

Payment Reference: {{eventShortName}}-{{eventEdition}}-{{registrationNumber}}

You can see your position on the waiting-list at the event's registration overview at Runners Hub.

Best regards,
KrUltra

This email was sent to {{email}}. If you did not register for this event, please ignore it.
